description: This file defines a React functional component named OAuthPanel that provides a user interface for initiating OAuth 2.0 authentication flows for Jira and Confluence services, utilizing context-based authentication methods and handling loading states, success, and error callbacks.
published: default export of the OAuthPanel React component

methods.name: OAuthPanel
methods.description: React functional component handling OAuth 2.0 authentication UI and logic for Jira and Confluence.

methods.name: handleOAuthConnect
methods.description: Async function that initiates the OAuth login process for the selected service, manages loading state, and handles success or error callbacks.
